text: Lahupāvuraṇaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā aḍḍhateyyakaṃsaparamaṃ cetāpetabbaṃ
edit: Lahupāvuraṇaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā aḍḍhateyyakaṃsaparamaṃ cetāpetabbaṃ

translations.transtext: 12. When a bhikkhunī is asking for a light cloth, one worth two and a half "bronzes" at most may be asked for.
